full_summary:
# W0125-23WR09: Amendment to Solicitation

## Description
A clarification has been made to the solicitation schedule for the contract W0125-23WR09.  Bidders are required to submit their proposals by July 19th, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT. Please disregard any previously posted closing times on Ariba Discovery or Canada Buys for this solicitation.

## Background
This amendment was made to the solicitation, W0125-23WR09, regarding the provision of Air Movement Technician services to the Department of National Defence (DND). Bidders are required to have a Supply Arrangement under E60ZT-18TSPS and be qualified under Tier 1 for the category of Consultant, with a security clearance of Secret and region of Ontario, with expertise level of Junior.

## Required Documentation
Bidders must submit the following documentation along with their proposals:

- Valid Supply Arrangement under E60ZT-18TSPS
- Proof of qualification under Tier 1 for the specified category of Consultant
- Proof of required security clearance
- Proof of region and expertise level

## Consequences of Late Submission
Any proposal received after 2:00 PM EDT on July 19th, 2023 will be considered non-responsive and deemed non-compliant. Please note that failure to submit the required documentation will lead to the same consequences.

## Access to the Solicitation Documents
Access to the solicitation documents is available through the Canada Buys website. The solicitation reference number is WS4025643373.

## Contact Information 

Alexa Fraser,
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage,
Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5,
Canada.

Email: alexa.fraser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
